content.rendered:
MBFWMadrid


Spring Summer 24 

12-17 SEP 2023


Welcome to MBFWMadrid, the Spanish fashion reference event and the great exponent of the fashion author in our country. A reference place for the fashion industry, professional buyers, designers, clients, and press, both national and international.


Don't miss everything that happens in MBFWMadrid through our website. Live Streams, Fashion Talks, Fashion Lessons, Street Style, interviews with designers and sponsors on the official set of MBFWMadrid, award ceremonies and much more.


Welcome to the Spanish fashion party!


Buy tickets


More on https://www.ifema.es @mbfwmadrid
